display.name: Prosperous

display.descriptionFormatted: Completing this vault guarantees an artifact!

display.descriptionFormatted: Players in this vault no longer regenerate mana

display.descriptionFormatted: Players move faster in this vault! (+2 Speed)

display.name: Afterlife
display.description: You will gain 50% less experience in this vault, but if you die you will keep your inventory and receive a durability penalty.

display.name: Phoenix
display.description: If killed in a vault you will be revived instantly and the Phoenix modifier will fizzle

display.name: Beginner's Grace
display.description: If killed in the vault you will keep your inventory but receive a durability penalty.

display.description: If killed in the vault you will keep your inventory but receive a durability penalty.

display.name: Locked
display.description: This vault can not be exited without completing it.

display.description: -50% Trap Disarm & Increases traps while below 0%

display.description: Healing in this vault is very inefficient
display.descriptionFormatted: Healing in this vault is very inefficient

display.description: Healing is more efficient! (+50% Healing Effectiveness)
display.descriptionFormatted: Healing is more efficient! (+%d%% Healing Effectiveness)

display.name: Idona's Favour
display.description: Players deal more ability damage in this vault

display.name: Herald's Grace
display.description: Dying in this vault does not cause you any item loss, and this vault is of course locked.

display.name: Cake Layer
display.description: Increases mob damage, mob speed, soul shards, all chest spawns, coins, the amount of items in the crake and the chance of getting an artifact

display.name: Flame
display.description: Your streak of this ascension, each stack increases the difficulty of the objective.

display.name: Plunderer
display.description: This vault yields no experience, and has a lower chance of finding an artifact, but has 10% more loot and slightly more ores

display.name: Ethereal
display.description: Mobs in this vault can spawn in as ethereal, being immune to any damage.

display.name: Soulless
display.description: Mobs in this vault do not drop soul shards

display.name: Fading
display.description: Taking damage in this vault removes hearts instead of emptying them.

display.description: Highlights Treasure Doors in this vault
